title: "New HiddenLayer platform provides protection for machine learning models"
excerpt: "The HiddenLayerMLSec Platform is comprised of the company’s flagship products HiddenLayer MLDR, ModelScanner and Security Audit Reporting. HiddenLayer MLDR uses a machine learning-based approach to analyze model events in real-time to identify malicious activity without requiring access to the organization’s models or sensitive training data."
